### CNVs, regulatory variants and other variants that dont alter the sequence of a gene

add '\*' to gene symbol and explain mechanism in comments

for CNVs, list candidate gene(s) if known, put multiple candidate genes in square brackets and separate by ';':\
e.g [HOXD11;HOXD12;HOXD13]
